chunked_vad.lyrics_text: I've been holding my breath I've been counting to ten Over something you said I've been holding back tears

I'm alone in bed You know I, I'm afraid of change Guess that's why we stay the same So tell me to leave

I'll pack my bags, get on the road Find someone that loves you Better than I do, darling, I know 'Cause you remind me every day
